verses.name: Psalms 37:11
verses.text: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

verses.name: Psalms 37:12
verses.text: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.

verses.name: Psalms 37:13
verses.text: The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.

verses.name: Psalms 37:14
verses.text: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.

verses.name: Psalms 37:15
verses.text: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.

verses.name: Psalms 37:16
verses.text: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.
